SELECT SUM(sc_score) FROM tbl_score WHERE sc_stnum = #{st_num}

SELECT sc_seq, sc_stnum, ST.st_name AS sc_stname, sc_sbcode, SB.sb_name AS sc_sbname, sc_score FROM tbl_score SC LEFT JOIN tbl_student ST ON SC.sc_stnum = ST.st_num LEFT JOIN tbl_subject SB ON SC.sc_sbcode = SB.sb_code ORDER BY SC.sc_stnum, SC.sc_sbcode

SELECT SB.sb_code AS ss_code, SB.sb_name AS ss_sbname, SB.sb_prof AS ss_prof, SC.sc_stnum AS ss_stnum, SC.sc_score AS ss_score FROM tbl_subject SB LEFT JOIN tbl_score SC ON SC.sc_sbcode = SB.sb_code AND SC.sc_stnum = #{st_num} LIMIT 5
